content.text:
# King of Freedom World Championship

)
| youngest       = Drew Parker ()
| heaviest       = Yuji Hino (271 lbs)
| lightest       = Daisuke Masaoka (154 lbs)
| pastnames      =
}}
The King of Freedom World Championship, also referred to as the , is a professional wrestling championship created and promoted by the Japanese promotion Pro Wrestling Freedoms. It is the top title of the company and is usually disputed in deathmatches.
Title history
There have been a total of 24 reigns shared between ten different champions and one vacancy. The current champion is Violento Jack who is in his fifth reign.
